TEXT.TITLE: AMOCO REPORTS SOUTH CHINA SEA OIL FIND
TEXT.BODY: The U.S. <Amoco Petroleum Corp> has reported an offshore oil find at its Pearl River basin concession in the South China Sea, the New China News Agency said. It said the Liu Hua 11-1-1 A well produced at around 2,240 barrels per day at a depth of 305 metres. The news agency said Amoco plans to drill a second well in the area this year, but gave no further details. REUTER
